ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Just wondering...
ygData.msgSnippet: Get the sword, you will look much cooler  the claw looks silly.  : ) That s just my opinion. Mu Yes, I know what they say about opinions. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Get the sword, you will look much "cooler" the claw looks silly. : )
That's just my opinion.

Mu

Yes, I know what they say about opinions.

-----Original Message-----
From: wilk_mysliwski@... [mailto:wilk_mysliwski@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 15, 2001 2:20 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Just wondering...


According to Everlore.com, you are correct. those 2 do have the same
stats. But the icetooth claw only weighs 2.0 while the Crystalized
Sword weighs 4.0.

Do you happen to have an Icetooth claw for sale?? :D


--- In EverQuest@y..., "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@v...> wrote:
> Doesn't it have the same stats as Icetooth's claws? might be able
to get those cheaper and they are light. Just /punt me if I'm
thinking about the wrong sword here but what I am thinking is a
11/29, don't remember weight.
